oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blockhouse drawing, sheet No. 4
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Block-house sketches showing the second story of a blockhouse for artillery. For practical use in the field by Capt. W.E. Merrill, U.S. Engineers, Chief Engineer: Army of the Cumberland.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Merrill, W. E. (William Emery), 1837-1891; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Blockades; United States. Army--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
